data.subject: Love, You Didn`t Do Right By Me
data.lyric:
Love, you didn't do right by me
 You planned a romance that just hadn't a chance
 And I'm through

data.subject: Sisters
data.lyric:
Sisters, sisters
 There were never such devoted sisters
 Never had to a shaperone
 No sir
 I'm here

data.subject: Black Coffee (Single Ver.)
data.lyric:
I'm feelin' mighty lonesome
 Haven't slept a wink
 I walk the floor from nine to four
 In between I
